name: Twin Doors
description:
A top-down shooter with puzzle aspects. Get to the flower as fast as you can without dying. 

WASD to move, Click to shoot.

You control two twins, but you don't decide which twin you control. It is out of control!

The green twin can run faster and open doors, while the blue twin is slower and can shoot the enemies.

Programming : PotatoOfShadows

Art : PotatoOfShadows

Sound and Music : PotatoOfShadows
